scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/web && npm run lint -w functions
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w apps/web && npm run lint:fix -w functions
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/web && npm run typecheck -w functions
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/web && npm run test -w functions
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci -w apps/web && npm run test:ci -w functions
scripts.deploy:functions:staging: firebase use miamente-staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:production: firebase use miamente-prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting:staging: firebase use miamente-staging && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:hosting:production: firebase use miamente-prod && firebase deploy --only hosting
